this_title: Funny or Die's High Science Season 1
introduction: Apparently, it’s time to “get high on science.”Discovery+ and HBO Max are debuting Funny or Die’s High Science, a hijinks-filled docuseries that focuses on “real facts from the cutting edge of human knowledge.”Debuting April 20, High Science stars Matt Klinman and Zack Poitras as two stoner lab assistants who get high on science, while Paul Bettany voices the futuristic, talking bong “Dr. Oh” who takes the duo on psychedelic trips of scientific discovery.Episodes will become available to stream on HBO Max and Discovery+ and the series will premiere two episodes weekly beginning April 26 on Discovery Channel.S1 E1 A Trip to the MoonS1 E2 Human Kind BudS1 E3 The Dank Web of TreesS1 E4 Aliens of AntiquityS1 E5 Unlimited LifeS1 E6 High Science Trailer
chinese_title: Funny or Die's High Science Season 1
